subject: Speedskating
lead_paragraph: Denny Morrison of Canada won the 1,500-meter speedskating world title in Heerenveen, Netherlands, despite appearing to be hampered by Shani Davis of the United States.
snippet: Denny Morrison of Canada won the 1,500-meter speedskating world title in Heerenveen, Netherlands, despite appearing to be hampered by Shani Davis of the United States.
